title: BOARDWALK / REPORTING TO KIM
description: If Kim wasn't with you when you first discovered the body then you're going to have to tell him about it. (Jumps here from Kim's main; then jumps back).

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you serious?" The lieutenant's..."
dialogueTree.text: "Are you serious?" The lieutenant's face changes immediately, taking on a more sombre expression.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How long has he been dead? Did you..."
links.text: "How long has he been dead? Did you *identify* him, search through his pockets? Is he still there?"

links.title: You: ""I found a library card from his po..."
links.text: "I found a library card from his pockets, but I haven't examined it yet. The body is still there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great, we should call the library..."
links.text: "Great, we should call the library -- maybe it can provide us with a lead. That is, if we decide to take the case."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Taking the case would mean that we..."
links.text: "Taking the case would mean that we need to identify the man and take care of the corpse. I can take the body to the morgue on my own or we could ask for the help of the Hardie boys."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But if all of this seems too much..."
links.text: "But if all of this seems too much of a hassle, then there's also the option of reporting back to the station and leaving the case for our colleagues to solve."

links.title: You: ""I found a library card from his po..."
links.text: "I found a library card from his pockets, issued to someone named Billie Méjean by the Jamrock Public Library. The body is still there."

links.title: You: ""Whoah, easy now... I haven't done..."
links.text: "Whoah, easy now... I haven't done anything yet, I wanted to tell you first."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods to himself, thi..."
links.text: The lieutenant nods to himself, thinking. "From where I stand I can see two options. We either take the case or report back to the station and leave it for our colleagues to handle."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If we take the case then we have t..."
links.text: "If we take the case then we have to identify the man and take care of the corpse. I can take the body to the morgue on my own or we can ask for the help of the Hardie boys."

links.title: You: ""Hold on -- what about field autops..."
links.text: "Hold on -- what about field autopsy?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Field autopsy isn't necessary if t..."
links.text: "Field autopsy isn't necessary if the cause of death doesn't appear to be criminal -- and this looks like a simple accident to me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'd say we should just write down..."
links.text: "I'd say we should just write down 'head trauma' in the autopsy report and leave it at that. It would save us at least two hours of unnecessary work."

links.title: You: ""Yes, but... isn't that kind of slo..."
links.text: "Yes, but... isn't that kind of sloppy?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe, but we don't really have th..."
links.text: "Maybe, but we don't really have that much time or resources to spare. Still, if you want to go ahead -- be my guest."

links.title: You: ""You're right, I don't see anything..."
links.text: "You're right, I don't see anything criminal here. Let's leave it at that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good call.""
links.text: "Good call."

links.title: You: ""Let's leave this case for the stat..."
links.text: "Let's leave this case for the station, I don't want to spend any time on it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright. The station is going to w..."
links.text: "Alright. The station is going to want details, however. Let's make sure we didn't miss anything before we head back to my Kineema to make the call."

links.title: You: ""I want us to solve the case comple..."
links.text: "I want us to solve the case completely on our own."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright. We're still going to have..."
links.text: "Alright. We're still going to have to call the station to let them know we're taking on an additional case, and so they can take away the body."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should also give the Jamrock Li..."
links.text: "We should also give the Jamrock Library a call, see if we can learn anything about this Billie Méjean."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's make sure we didn't miss any..."
links.text: "Let's make sure we didn't miss anything -- especially any identifying information -- before we go."
